name: propresenterwords
description: Extract and export worship song lyrics from ProPresenter 7 playlists as text, JSON, or PowerPoint. Cross-platform CLI with standalone executables for macOS, Windows, and Linux.

scripts.build:exe: npm run build && mkdir -p executables && pkg dist/cli.js --output executables/propresenter-lyrics --targets node18-win-x64,node18-macos-x64,node18-macos-arm64,node18-linux-x64 --assets logo.png --options max-old-space-size=4096
